title: MasterBox or MasterOven?  Cooler Master Q500L Review
description: The Cooler Master Q500L is a great looking compact case that can fit an ATX motherboard and is highly modular. Its actually one of the smallest ATX cases around but there's low airflow challenges everywhere.   That means if you aren't careful internal temperatures could get out of control.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Q500L:   Riing Fans:   Ironclaw Mouse:    That Lamp:     Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Cooler Master. This video is sponsored by Thermaltake & Corsair. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  masterboxq500l #coolermaster #hardwarecanucks #masterbox
